text: My 4yo daughter has been attending classes at this art studio for about 4 months. I initially was not quite used to it as it was quite a free and easy concept where teachers will allow the kids to decide on an artwork of their choice in between the scheduled lessons. Turned out she is pretty excited about this part as she gets to do what she likes. Teachers are also patient and allow them to be creative in their expression which is crucial.

My son loves art since young age and his first time with Art village was in 2018 (when he was 6 years old)  now he is 13 and he is still enjoying his time there, he learns a lot , and it’s feel like a family there.
My son thoroughly enjoyed the trial class and appreciates Ms. Farz's dedication and teaching style. We are eager to explore future class offerings..

My 8-year-old daughter has fun and enjoys from her heart learning here every week. She has created many art works and is challenging by devising various art materials and drawing methods. Her imagination has improved and often draws painting even at home. She gets more confident and looks so happy because of this lesson.

My kid has been here for a term and she enjoys her classes truly. It’s a blessing in disguise as she’s able to articulate her imagination in the form of paint at her own pace. The staff are kind, nurturing and understanding. I appreciate their communication!
